wreckintro0.text: Keys can be rebinded in settings from pause menu.

elevator0.text: The elevator does not appear to be functional.

ENDING0.name: Pelican
ENDING0.text: Now, go and play some pvp.

tourDialog1.name: Pelican
tourDialog1.text: This is the vessel's Armory. Here, you can equip and unequip weapons.

tourDialog1.name: Pelican
tourDialog1.text: The hull of the S.S. Tunicate is above-average in durability. Feel free to test out new weapons inside.

tourDialog2.name: Pelican
tourDialog2.text: At the Reliquary, you can equip and unequip Artifacts that bestow passive benefits.

tourDialog2.name: Pelican
tourDialog2.text: To equip an Artifact, a Salvager must have adequate Artifact Slots. As default, you have 4 slots. More powerful Artifacts take up more slots.

tourDialog3.name: Pelican
tourDialog3.text: You can equip an Active Item at the Dispensary. Press fugactivefug to use a variety of different powers once your Active Item is charged.

tourDialog3.name: Pelican
tourDialog3.text: Active Item charge is indicated by the bar underneath the item name. Some items charge over time. Others charge by dealing damage.

tourDialog4.name: Pelican
tourDialog4.text: At the Navigation Telepyramid, the player can warp to a number of locations in the map.

tourDialog4.name: Pelican
tourDialog4.text: If you see any more Telepyramids in the world, activate them so you can revisit them from the Navigations menu whenever you want.

tourDialog4.name: Pelican
tourDialog4.text: The Arena Telepyramid allows you to train your skills in a survival arena mode.

tourDialog4.name: Pelican
tourDialog4.text: The Bonus Telepyramid gives access to a Sandbox as well as a sneak peak at some Boss Fights.

tourDialog5.name: Pelican
tourDialog5.text: On the top floor is the Quartermaster. Spend your hard earned currency on new weapons and other items.

tourDialog5.name: Pelican
tourDialog5.text: (for the purposes of this demo, all items have been unlocked already)

tourDialog6.name: Pelican
tourDialog6.text:
And finally, ship Communications can be used to chat with myself.
I'll always be here in case you forget anything.

tourDialog6.name: Pelican
tourDialog6.text:
Oh and one more thing, I've been getting into Poetry as of late.
Let me know if you'd like to hear a poem.

poem.name: Pelican
poem.text:
You want to hear a poem?
Ok! Here it goes~
Ahem...

poemGood1.name: Pelican
poemGood1.text:
Really? Thanks.
That really means a lot to me.

poemGood3.name: Pelican
poemGood3.text:
I appreciate it.
I hope you like the next one too.

poemGood4.name: Pelican
poemGood4.text:
Thank you.
Let me know if you want another one.

poemGood5.name: Pelican
poemGood5.text:
That's sweet of you.
I really do try, you know.

poemGood6.name: Pelican
poemGood6.text:
Thank you.
I felt like that one turned out well too.

poemBad1.name: Pelican
poemBad1.text:
Oh. Sorry.
I'll try harder next time.

poemBad2.name: Pelican
poemBad2.text:
Oh. Well.
I'll keep at it.

poemBad3.name: Pelican
poemBad3.text:
Hmm.
I hope you like the next one more.

poemBad4.name: Pelican
poemBad4.text:
Ah.
I appreciate the honest feedback.

poemBad5.name: Pelican
poemBad5.text:
Oh.
I wonder what I'm doing wrong.

poemBad6.name: Pelican
poemBad6.text:
Ah well.
The last guy didn't like it much either.
